description: Searches for summary information about systems in the user's account. You can filter by the ID of a workflow to return only systems that use the specified workflow.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An array of filters that limit the result set. The only valid filter is FLOW_TEMPLATE_ID. (dict) --- An object that filters a system search. The name of the system search filter field. An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the system search filter field.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search.

nested_items.name: summaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain summary information about each system deployment in the result set.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the system.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to specify as nextToken when you request the next page of results.
